page.title: 07LIFE AT WEEKENDS.
page.content: WE DO NOT GO TO SCHOOL AT WEEKENDS SO THESE ARE SOME OF THE THINGS WE DO IN OUR FAMILY.MOST{SATURDAYS}AFTER BREAKFAST MY SISTER AND I GO SHOPPING WITH MUM.DAD STOPS AT HOME TO DO JOBS.WE GO TO A BIG TOWN SUCH AS STOCKTON.WE GO TO THE MARKET AND LOOK AROUND THE SHOPS AND I SPEND MY 70 PENCE POCKET MONEY.WE COME HOME IN THE CAR AND HAVE DINNER.IN THE AFTERNOON I PLAY WITH MY SISTER.AFTER TEA WE WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL BEDTIME AT 10.00. ON{SUNDAY}SOME PEOPLE GO TO CHURCH BUT WE VISIT MY GRANDMA.WE COME BACK TO HAVE DINNER.SOMETIMES WE GO FOR A RIDE IN THE COUNTRY.AFTER TEA WE WATCH TELEVISION OR GO OUT TO PLAY.WE HAVE TO GO TO BED EARLIER SO THAT WE ARE READY FOR SCHOOL.
